title: Industry-Specific - 20 Examples

title: Design OpenSpec for Portal
description: Define the API endpoints, state management, and component architecture in openspec/portal.md

title: MEGA: 235 Real-World Agent Examples
description: Master epic for building 235 production-ready agent examples covering business, engineering, healthcare, education, content, personal, research, industry, gaming, and specialized domains. See openspec/mega-examples/ for full specifications.

title: Business & Enterprise - 60 Examples
description: 6 subcategories: Sales (10), Marketing (10), Customer Success (10), Finance (10), HR (10), Legal (10). Covers lead scoring, CRM enrichment, campaign analytics, invoice processing, resume screening, contract review, etc.

description: Single category covering tutoring, flashcards, language practice, course recommendations, essay grading, quiz generation, study planning, etc.
